title: Season 9 is Almost Here!
description: LeVar Burton Reads is back June 22nd, featuring stories from P Djeli Clark, Anjali Sachdeva, Ekaterina Sedia, Isabel Yap and more. But if you just can't wait to hear a new story -- here's a sneak peek...
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
